19.2.1. Warnings Starting in MPI-4.1


Up: Additional Warnings Next: Warnings Starting in MPI-4.0 Previous: Additional Warnings

Implementations are no longer allowed to implement MPI_WTICK, PMPI_WTICK, MPI_WTIME, and PMPI_WTIME as well as handle conversion functions as macros (Sections Timers and Synchronization and Transfer of Handles). This should not impact applications but may require changes in some implementations.


Up: Additional Warnings Next: Warnings Starting in MPI-4.0 Previous: Additional Warnings
